name: Might and Magic VIII Saved Game

description: Might and Magic VIII is a role-playing video game published by 3DO. In the game, which is a direct sequel to Might and Magic VII, players guide a party of up to five characters on an adventure through the fictional continent of Jadame, a new location in the world of Enroth.
Saved Might and Magic VIII games are stored in MM8 files. The game typically saves players' MM8 files in the following directory:
Might and Magic VIII is also available from GOG.com, a digital game distribution platform. The GOG.com version of Might and Magic VIII saves MM8 files in the following directory:
NOTE: Some Might and Magic VIII saves instead use the .dod extension.
